website_summaries.verdict: A two-pack from a trusted brand that works on soft surfaces beyond carpeting, such as pet bedding.
pros: Two bottles are included for the price
Spray bottles have two settings for customized cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner - Repeat Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is the best I have used. Originally purchased for a barfy kitty who was near end of life, I found that it is the best carpet cleaner I have ever used. I have used it for cleaning up after some messes from some of the older folks in our household as well. I like that there is sanitizing in it too. Even has removed the food dye color from the cat food coloring. I am a satisfied repeat purchaser.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning your couch!
customer_reviews.text: So I have no pets. However, I have a messy child, and a beige couch. I used this with a sponge to clean my entire couch and it removed stains from I don't even know what. Slime, crayons, and Lord knows what else. Leaves a nice clean look and smells fresh too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your not getting the real Woolite Advanced
customer_reviews.text: I love Woolite Advanced! It is the only thing I have found that works to get out the urine smell from fabric(potty training son). I couldn’t find time to get to the store so I just ordered from Amazon. What I got is 100% not Woolite Advanced, but more like Woolite Insta Clean. The Advanced has a distinct smell, that doesn’t smell like cleaner, and this just isn’t it. Now I have to go back to the store and get the right one! Very disappointing and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor, covers well
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell. Could be good or bad. Good to cover dog smells bad as I don’t like to breathe toxins. Worked well for puppy stainsnon the carpet. Didn’t get all stains out but helped. Our personal shampooer got the rest of the stains out. No more accidents too after shampooing as all smells are gone. Ordered this one more time until potty trained. Couldn’t find at the grocery store. Worked better than some other sprays we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you barely even have to scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I have been super impressed with how well it gets stains up off the floor. It cleans cat messes up great. It has a spray and a stream and an off mode. My photos include a before stains, and a during stain (after the spray goes on it can bubble on it a bit if it is a fresh stain), the last photo I haven't even used paper towel on the stain yet and most of it has come up. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great sanitizer, temporary stain-remover
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work for sanitizing urine and nagging the odor. My puppy has started having accidents again in his teething stage a bit but has never had an accident the same place twice now or when we were first training. I know This, however, because the 3 spots in the carpet we have used this product with in our bedroom all are visible again a week-long after clean up. My other con is that the smell is incredibly strong and not great if you have detergent allergies.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Woolite Advanced Pet Stain & Odor Remover...
customer_reviews.text: My large breed dog was sick with the runs and got it ALL. OVER. our bedroom carpet. I was able to clean it up and get the smell out with this stuff for the most part but there is still a bit of staining in some spots.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Keeps odor away and smells clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Unfortunately our big guy has a very skiddish bladder. From the day he was rescued we've had to work hard to prevent little accidents. Every now and then we'll have a an accident on the carpet and this stuff is great. I love that it is sanitizing and truly seems to get rid of any odor, not just mask it. After a few sprays and following instructions, when I leave and come back into the room for the next day, it smells fresh and no potty smells come through afterward. We keep a bottle on hand. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: My2CentsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have two puppies, some accidents happened in the old carpet, I tried to clean the carpet with detergent but the smell did not go away. I tried this product, I left it overnight and clean it the next day and no difference whatsoever, just a strong chemical smell for a while, if you read the instructions it says it is not recommended for wool carpets , cotton or acrylic which makes me think if it is worthy to buy it, the stains were still there and so the smells . I won't recommend it for cleaning dog urine
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jarahian

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work at all!!! First off the smell of pee is already nasty then you use this stuff and the smell is worse! It’s so strong!!! And the worst part after dealing with the nasty smell it didn’t ever clean the pee smell!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Jane

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like hospitals used to!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know yet for sure if this stuff really works in getting rid of cat marking smell. I used it for the first time last night and it smelled pretty bad to me, and I resprayed it again this morning because after the spray smell wore off I could still smell a bit of cat in the carpet. What I do know for sure at this point is I hate the smell of this product! If you like the smell of Pinesol, or don't mind the way hospitals used to smell in the old days, then maybe you won't mind the sent of this. I won't use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with pet odor!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write a negative review but I wanted to warn other users prior to purchasing! For some reason my cat picked up bad habit and has been peeing on our leather sofa. I purchased this after reading many positive reviews! This product does not work at all!!! Odor remains! Stain remains! They do not return although Im a prime member. They contact you with the dealer, however they never call you back. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Great product, scent, no residue
customer_reviews.text: Probably best for carpet. In most cases saves or replaces carpet cleaning completely. There is a scent but nothing over the top, I’d say it’s as expected from this type of product. Great value for sure. Pretty easy to use, I like that it doesn’t leave behind a film or residue really. Most cases you won’t even know anything happened. Not oily like some products. Not sticky at all. I would think twice about using it on delicate surfaces but in most cases probably won’t hurt the surface. Does have some cleaning power and disinfectant. In cases like a leather couch, combined with scrubbing might take out some of the leather color, possibly. I did not use on leather.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: It's going to happen to every pet owner eventually: an accident happened on the rug, and you're frantically searching your cabinets for an appropriate cleaning solution. In that moment, you'll thank yourself for having ordered this spray "just in case"... The "odor remover" works as advertised, on all kinds of odors and all kinds of stains. You can imagine it, this thing will remove it. How? Probably though the magic of chemistry. Think of this as a gift to your future self, and buy one now.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Truly smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed our couch with this product in hope to kill some germs...when my husband came home his nose wrinkled up and he asked, "what died in here?" I'll just stick to lysol.
customer_reviews.author: sbarna411

customer_reviews.title: BAD at cleaning stains, good at ruining rug!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not remove the pet stain, and it ruined my rug! I've never had such a bad cleaning product for pet messses. After one use I threw it away and ordered the brand I used to use before trying this. I'm furious about what it did to my rug!
customer_reviews.author: shopper489

customer_reviews.title: No more accidents!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new puppy and of course, there have been some accidents as she learns. I initially used this to clean up after her, but I noticed she would never go in the spot I had cleaned again, and would sneak around for somewhere else to go. I sprayed all rugs and carpets and my house smells much fresher, but more importantly, she hasn't gone inside at all since I did that 3 days ago. She will sniff around and then whine to go out!
customer_reviews.author: Sue smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff lifted a urine stain from our dog that really showed in our light-colored carpet. I was happy enough after one use, but just last week decided to see if I could remove even more. It's been a couple of months since she piddled there, but I thought well, nothing to lose by trying. It helped! I actually can't see where the stain was anymore - hallelujah! The scent on this isn't terrible, it hasn't discolored anything I have used it on, and it lifted an older/not fresh urine stain. I also used it on a couple of non-pet mystery spots (grease, I think) and it took care of those as well. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tami P.

customer_reviews.title: BEST IF ALL THE REST..No clean vs other area differences
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all pet owners! Tried them all but this is fast,cleans perfectly, smell does detour pet from using same area and it doesn't leave cleaner spot vs area not needing cleaning. I'm so done fooling around with the rest.
customer_reviews.author: JUST-ME

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had an old throw up stain on the carpet that I tried to remove with a carpet shampooer. And even tho I was able to get rid of the stain, the smell stayed and got even worse from all the moisture. I ordered this spray specifically for the odor, and omg, it worked miracles! I don't understand why some people complain about the smell, to me it didn't seem that strong, even tho I'm sensitive to smells. It just smells clean and fresh, much better than the nasty throw up smell! The only thing I would change is i'd make the sprayer stream more dispersed, so it can cover a larger area on the carpet..
customer_reviews.author: Yuyu

customer_reviews.title: Odor remover or masking smell?
customer_reviews.text: This worked alright, I feel like it didn't remove my puppy's pee smell after, it just kind of masked it. Either way, my puppy would still pee in the spot where I've cleaned up with the spray after it has dried so I'm not sure this worked but I had originally purchased 2 bottles and won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: iammindeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Takes the odors out!
customer_reviews.text: Really does remove odor. I would recommend for old odor to spray at least two sessions and let it sit. The smell is a bit strong but it’s a lot better than the smell of urine!! I recommend this product. I spray it on my carpet, cloth furniture and in my car as well! It really does take odors out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of cleaners
customer_reviews.text: If I could marry a cleaner, this would be it. This is like a multipurpose cleaner with some type of magical crap added to it. It CLEANED my flat paint. I'm talking 4yrs of kid hands I couldn't remove. Used this and a microfiber cloth and out. No scrubbing just wipe. Cleaned my microfiber couch. Cleaned my baseboards. And it smells AMAZING. Literally hate the one with the brush but this sanitize one is sent from the gods themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda cohen

customer_reviews.title: Woolite has brought "going cheaper" to a new level!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact same product from here a few months ago, the same set and everything, and to my surprise, I received two bottles of spray but only one spray nozzle! They have plugs on both bottles, and are so cheap that they have only included one plastic nozzle to spray! What if I wanted to give one away? These nozzles are maybe less than 5 cents for them! Never have I seen this from a billion dollar company, I can only hope that the formula is still the same! Really this is false advertising! smh
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a microfiber recliner. It's in great condition, no stains, but smelled of dogs, which I'm not allowed to have in my apartment. And the odor was bad when the AC ran. So I needed to clean it. I tried all the DIY stuff usually recommended by blogs today (baking soda & essential oil, vinegar, witch hazel) with no success. So I needed something effective & affordable. I did some looking & found this. It took a few uses over the weekend to wear down the odor, but it improved each time I treated it. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: krk01

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I’d definitely buy this again. Much better than the Resolve carpet powder cleaner. It doesn’t stain your carpet, and it cleans any pet mess really quickly. I’ve woken up to dried dog vomit on the carpet, and this took it right out! No more stains, super easy, and quick to use!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: The best pet spray!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite pet cleanup spray, and I haven't found it yet in our local stores. I use it exclusively to clean up cat vomit and hairballs, which it does a great job of. I have no idea if it actually sanitizes or not, but it gives me peace of mind that it is supposed to. I think the smell is pleasant and neutral but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Magical sanity saving stain remover.
customer_reviews.text: We have several cats, all with various stomach sensitivities. Every night I wake up to the dulcet tones of a cat or two christening patches of carpet with hairball stains, or worse. Since I found this Woolite Advanced, I just roll over and go back to sleep. I find the offending patches in the morning, spray them, and in a few minutes all my cats' hard work is undone as if the stains had never happened. I haven't yet had a stain that isn't completely removed by this magic elixir. I buy multiple bottles at a time to keep on hand, and if they ever stop making this I will cry.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: The odor from this spray is horrendous
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this pet stain cleaner over my usual brand as this was a bit cheaper. However, the odor left behind by this spray has basically ruined my rug and smells worse than the cat vomit it is suppose to be cleaning. I tried washing the smell left from this spray with some soap and water to no avail. I would not recommend this product as the solution is worse than the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without spray head!
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 bottles, but neither bottle had a spray pump, so I really can’t use this product until I find a spray attachment that fits! Not easy right now, and I’m sure it will cost more money than it’s is worth (as most things are right now)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first but after using it on my couch and carpet I'm sold. Works great and also removes the nasty smell my bad kitty left behind when he decided to stop using his litter box after 4 years... Saved my couch from bieng ruined. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: No smells!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 month old puppy and my biggest fear was my house smelling like dog pee because let's face it, no matter how much you stay on top of it, accidents happen! Also ours Turns out to be an excited piddler lol. Daddy walks through the door and that's it, pee everywhere! This product has been amazing!! We spray it where she goes and by the time we need to towel dry it up we cant even find where it was! There have been many accidents so far and my house is still smell free! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed my furniture down with this. Between two millwrights, 3 kids two dogs and a cat in the house things tend to get a bit stinky/dirty. This stuff worked great. Smell kind of reminds me of pine sol or lime J-ello lol not bad but not great. Better than the perfume type tho, as this seems to neutralize the odors and sanitizes at the same time. I have a 4 month old lab puppy that gets excited and tinkles everywhere and so I used this on my bedroom carpet. Stains are gone and there’s no odor.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Slick

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a litter box
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the same as the Bissell spray that we’ve used for years. I was so wrong. The smell is just awful. My whole house smells like a dirty litter box. The Bissell spray didn’t leave a scent behind once dry, despite the stronger scent while being used. I’ll likely toss the rest of the bottle. I cannot handle my house smelling dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Aliannher

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago. I bought the twin pack to clean my floors, mats, and beds my 3 month old puppy peed on. Works great! I'm pretty satisfied with this product. It does smell a little different then other cleaning products but goes away in minutes and neutralizes the stench. The reason I'm mentioning that is because most reviews talk about how it smells. I don't think it was so bad. It kills 99.9% of germs and its pets friendly. Solves my two main issues. (:
customer_reviews.author: janet ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Worked well in the car for cleaning up after a sick grand baby on our road trip.
customer_reviews.text: As I occasionally drive for Uber or Lyft, I wanted a product that could help me to remove any potential messes made by riders. Luckily for me, the only mess in the car was a sick grand baby on a road trip. The Woolite worked perfectly as I had it in the trunk in my 'emergency kit'. I'm quite pleased with the product and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee Debbie of SheMakesTheRules

customer_reviews.title: Very chemical scent
customer_reviews.text: The puppy decided to eat a bunch of chocolate cupcakes crumbs at the park, which meant he had an emergency in the middle of the night in the carpet. This spray was very effective at going the stain out. My one complaint though is that it smells very much like strong cleaners, and even after airing the room out for a few hours it was still very apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have if you have pets!
customer_reviews.text: I have the sweetest, most well behaved cat and dog that I could ever ask for, but accidents can happen. They look sad when it happens but I am not upset because this Woolite spray cleans it very well. I have used it for spilled drinks and it worked great. It is my second best to breaking out the rug machine to clean a mess. The smell is strong but not the worst but it fades.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I have 3 great danes and a bunch of cats. I go through A LOT of this stuff. I have used a bunch of other products (Resolve, etc), and this is by far my favorite one. It removes stains of all kinds without leaving a soapy foam like some other products. Just sop up any excess liquid, spray liberally, and gently scrub with a damp rag. Vid of my pups for tax!
customer_reviews.author: siriuslyindane

customer_reviews.title: BEST Pet stain removal
customer_reviews.text: OMG. My sister told me about this Woolite Advanced Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Sanitize, product and I had to have it for my 2 dogs! This product is magic. Thank you Woolite. I have used so many different brands over the years with mediocre results. This have proven itself a keeper and I will definitely be re-ordering. I have 2 bottles now. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gisele L.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple cat household
customer_reviews.text: With several cats in the house accidents happen. I have tried several products to clean and remove the scent from carpets and this is the easiest product to use and removes the scent. The scent of the actual product is light and pleasant. Be sure to spray heavily on the area to be cleaned and allow it to dry. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ams

customer_reviews.title: I love the product and how it leaves a fresh smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and how it leaves a fresh smell afterwards. I find this works a little better then Nature's carpet cleaner for pets. I have toy poodle that can leave little spots here and there and this works miracles to get the area clean.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer in California

customer_reviews.title: Not the ssme as the product in the can.
customer_reviews.text: Leaves behind a sour smell. NOT the same as the carpet cleaning in the spray car. Awful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Shirlett Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mask odors. Removes odors completely!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I don’t even own pets, but I do own a toddler that likes to lay his milk bottles their sides. Half a bottle of milk leaked out onto his carpet in his room and I had no idea until the stench of sour milk filled his room. I tried everything to get rid of it. Nothing worked until I came across this magic in a bottle. The scent is fresh and it didn’t just mask the odor; it removed it completely. I also use this on my couch as a mild fabric cleaner and deodorizer for, once again, milk spots and dirty toddler trails.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Have an old dog that has accidents. While this works very you have to be very careful & not leave it on the rec. time or your carpet will lighten. It takes some babysitting & redoing so that you dont whiten your carpet but I really like this product. However, 1 of the 2 bottles sprayer, would NOT work. We ended up pouring the solution from it into the other bottle. Recommending the product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning up dog vomit on carpet or car upholstery.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog, you've likely woken up to the sound of your dog vomiting in the middle of the night. This product is your friend in cleanup. Great scent - not overpowering. Made for carpet. I've used it on bedspreads (if it's just a small spot), car seats, rugs. Smells fresh and clean after using.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle_T

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizer too!!! Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only product I can find that removes stains AND sanitizes. I think I have bought 5 bottles so far. (2 puppies and one naughty cat)
customer_reviews.author: A SaramaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Really strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Cleans pretty well, though it leaves a really really strong woolite scent which is very overwhelming. Used it to clean up cat pee from the couch and the living room had to be avoided for about 3 days... Definitely works on stains though!
customer_reviews.author: Spoco

customer_reviews.title: A must in our house!
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite carpet cleaner for cleaning up a pet mess or just a carpet stain. We literally use this for all spills because it doesn't get overly soapy and cleans up virtually everything. I've even used this for a wine spill on our couch. I also love how you know it is sanitizing when you clean so you don't need to use two products to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh.C

customer_reviews.title: The best for dog pee
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for dog pee on rugs. I use scotch guard on all my rugs and furniture. When you catch a pee spot, blot it up, spray this on and let it sit for a few min. Blot the spray up and the pee is 100% gone. I’ve saved a white... yes, white....rug with 3 dogs because of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: When I used this on dog poop it did not clean it well at all in carpet. I had to get my carpet cleaner out. I have purchased other products that have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on WOOL!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly, for a product described as suitable for carpet, and from a company called Woolite, the fine print on the bottle says "Do not use on wool carpet. Not for use on polypropylene or wool carpets." Wow.
customer_reviews.author: RobB

customer_reviews.title: Woolite! What did you do to this formula?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Woolite product in the past and it proved excellent in removing pet stain and cat urine odor. Woolite AdvancedPet Stain and Odor Removal + Santizer had a very pleasant fragrance and made removing pet accidents not such a chore. However the same Woolite I just received has an awful odor. After treating fresh cat urine I could barely tell it was treated. I am wondering if Woolite changed the formula or I got a “bad” batch. Either way cannot use this product and I have reached out to manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Unfortunately, I got the most use from a sweet, but defiant pup that I was hoping not to cage. The product, however, has a very light fragrance initially, that does not linger and quickly just becomes clean smelling air. I have used other products for pet odor on a variety of textures and for me this has been best overall for cleaning, deodorizing and removing bacterial odors.
customer_reviews.author: O2A

customer_reviews.title: It works on set in stain. Read below!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great! We had a trail of diarrhea to get out of the carpet. We tried OPRAH's method first. What a joke!!! By the time I got this product, it had set in some. I blasted it with this Woolite. I went over it twice. I wanted make sure it was eliminated!
customer_reviews.author: Szizzy Lea

customer_reviews.title: It cleans shag carpet
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean up some pet urine stains. It worked fairly well, but it should come with at least a small brush to attack the carpet soon after spraying and before rubbing it with some absorbent cloth/rag/etc. Perhaps Amazon could advertise a small brush along with the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette H. Rundt

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, did not perform as I expected
customer_reviews.text: has a pleasant scent but did not work as well as I expected. I bought it to use on high traffic carpet areas. Follow directions for best outcome. I just sprayed when I first used and then followed directions. The freshness did not last long or clean stains. I sprayed it in a cabinet to see how it worked and was pleasantly suprised. It left a fresh scent that lasted for weeks. I would not buy again for carpets, Resolve works so much better.
customer_reviews.author: pgirl

customer_reviews.title: It works to remove the smell of urine from carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I tried many other products to eliminate the smell of urine from carpet after my child had an accident while camping out on her bedroom floor. This plus the urine gone spray by Clorox worked miracles. I have also used this to clean pet messes too. I’m so glad that I purchased this product despite other negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kengreen38

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a little overwhelming but it works so well I can get past that. For deep stains, you’ll have to do multiple rounds but it’s amazing how much comes out after just one round of cleaning. I used this on my fabric couch to get rid of general dog stains. It doesn’t leave behind any residue and really gets all the stains out. You do have to coat the entire cushion and not just the stain otherwise it’ll leave a super clean spot compared to the rest of the area.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this stuff is a miracle cleaner for pet odor!!! I got it to use on my couch because of the dog odor it had. After the first spray down I noticed a huge improvement, after the second spray down all of the pet odor is gone! It also removed a stain with just a tiny bit of scrubbing. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: No pee stains or smell left behind!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We are potty training a new puppy and this has helped not to have any dog pee smell left behind when he has an accident! We have been through a bottle already, are on our second, and I’m ordering another to keep one on each floor of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get the stain out
customer_reviews.text: I use a UV light to check the spots after I clean them. I spray the area wait about 10min, Then I take my handheld shampooer and clean it up. It took care of the smell but the stain, when I checked with the light, is still there and it was bigger. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works well on potty training removing odors
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this, great price, works well. I had tried the Folex carpet stain remover but it doesn't have the scent remover of the caused odor so a dog will pee there again....the Woolite cleaner removed the odor so no repeat pees there.
customer_reviews.author: Briton13

customer_reviews.title: Does not take stains out of carpet
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. My dog puked in two spots on my carpet. I used this cleaner on both spots as directed, even let set longer than recommended. Stain was still there, it made almost no effect. Used vinegar and baking soda and that work much better. Don’t buy this just buy vinegar and baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it, it seemed smaller than it should have been, not to mention the smell wasn’t very correct? Instead of removing odors, it gave off a new odor so not necessarily very efficient. It doesn’t really work on my carpet either, so quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Smells good !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff ! It’s a miracle I use it for pee oopsies right now , potty training a toddler so I definitely need this around !!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog who throws up bile in the morning. This cleaner lifts the yellowish stain easily and deodorizes the rug. I used it on a urine spot that a friend's dog made on our rug, and it worked great for that too, with no lingering pee smell. I also use it to pretreat stains on dirty laundry before I drop them into the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K.

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant smelling
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product in the past and liked it. Presumably, they've changed the formula because instead of its usual pleasant fragrance it now has a strong chemical smell, which is not at all pleasant. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: This lifts the stains so easily thank God
customer_reviews.text: A LIFESAVER for hair ball ridden kitties. We have light carpet in our new home and our cats are notorious for their hair balls. This lifts the stains so easily thank God! Also found it worked really well on dog urine - there was an incident and this lifted the bright yellow the stain AND removed the odor, we buy 2-3 at a time!
customer_reviews.author: MrsP2012

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Both items arrived with the top sprayers broken. The top grey part of the spray is very cheap. They were broken on arrival and both had fallen off already with 1 minute of opening the package.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great for smelly shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my work shoes were smelling horrid despite multiple runs through the washing machine. This kills bacteria so I was hopeful that it would solve my problem. It has worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure this would work but it did. Excellent product. A neighbor borrowed it when her dog threw up on the carpeting and it worked well for her too. Excellent product. Reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised here. Have run through the gamete of pet stain/odor products and this one may be the best to date. Scent is great and truly neutralizes the odor without having to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Azelyn M

customer_reviews.title: Works....actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent and very easy to use. Have tried many other odor destroying techniques...even rug washing with an expensive odor eliminating shampoo that did not work at all...this does work...better than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Super job
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best stain and pet odor remover’s I’ve ever used. It does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This works well for dog urine, vomit, etc. It won't totally take care of cat urine though. For that, you'll want Nature's Miracle. However, this is a good all around spray to have on hand at all time for those pet cleanups. I like the idea it also sanitizes as well. The scent is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: So I desided to buy this, along with some commercial grade lysol to totally clean my mattress top. I help get some of the stain's out, and helped get rid of the odor. My mattress looks totally different now, and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  K

customer_reviews.title: Did not solve my problem
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and looking everywhere for something to get the pet smell out of my couch, I bought this stuff. I was so disappointed as it did not work for me. Not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna Gibson

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a senior pet owner I constantly battle with pet odors and stains from mishaps. This is the only cleaner that I have found to truly eliminate the carpet odor that tends to linger from pet urine. I love this stuff. I wish they made it in larger sizes and perhaps a carpet cleaner version as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Jones

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST PET STAIN REMOVER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The only pet stain cleaner I have ever used that really and truly does the job! Maybe this is why I can't find it anywhere but Amazon. If you have a furry little friend that likes to leave little tokens of appreciation all over your house as mine does, this will be sure to get the message across that it's NOT appreciated!! Take my word, you will be very impressed. I have a sensitive nose and I can tell the difference between using this product or using something else.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Works to well to cut pet smell.
customer_reviews.text: This actually works to rid items, carpet and othwr items of pet smell. Seems to work on all unwanted fabric smells. 1 light application works well for me. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and the money was worth it. It's cheaper then the stores and the smell is good too. Having lots of animals and lots of traffic it's perfect for getting stains out of the carpet or even upholstery. I use it on everything!
customer_reviews.author: Donna hope

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Remover I Found!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. I have used it for years. Cleans any stain perfectly and the scent is pleasant. I also use it to clean the kitties' litter boxes....I am so glad I can order it online since there are many stores that do not carry it. Their loss!
customer_reviews.author: irishwoman

customer_reviews.title: Why do they smell so bad?
customer_reviews.text: We used it one time and never again. It leaves an awful smell behind. I would rather just let my couch smell like dog. Unfortunate waste of money. We ended up buying the Arm & Hammer brand and LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bone

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works!! I've tried many pet enzymatic cleaners and this one is the best! Removed the smell from my furniture with the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: I have cats - and I depend on Woolite. I've used it for many years and nothing I've ever tried compares. So I hope this helps anyone with pets. It does not stain carpeting and penetrates to wipe out stains and odors.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn kilday

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - Not for WOOL rugs!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed because it literally says on the back "Not for use with wool rugs." Yet the name of the product is WOOLITE. It's really only for normal carpets. This bleached my expensive rug. It guess it's partly my fault for not reading the fine print. But seriously, false advertising, much?
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best carpet cleaner for pet stains
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best carpet cleaner for pet stains. NOTHING else works as well. stains disappear, or very stubborn, takes maybe 2 applications.
customer_reviews.author: Surfkitten

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product. I have tried others for my pet stains and odors, but this product was the best that I have found that done the job I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Great for minor messes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does wonder for minor messes on carpet, like cat barf. I wouldn't necessarily rely on it for larger messes, but it's good for general purpose pet stuff.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duzan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 2 other carpet cleaners. I am fostering a rescue dog and while getting adjusted to a new place she had some accidents. She was very dehydrated from her journey to Maryland from Texas so her pee had quite a strong scent to it but this cleaner got the scent out and cleaned the carpet without any trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for a few years, and it is great. It is BY FAR the best product for cleaning and deodorizing pet messes. The scent is light - not like some products with an overpowering scent. And it works great. We have tried all types of products in the past for cat and dog issues. None can compare. This is the ONLY product I use.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a godsend for puppy potty training. Despite dealing with lots of accidents, there are no stains. I have reordered this product three times.
customer_reviews.author: dng

customer_reviews.title: Extremely strong scent.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is extremely overwhelming. I can't use it because it lingers whether I used on linoleum floor or carpet the scent is too strong for me. Would't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stain Remover!
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this as a general stain remover because my pets do not stain my stuff...but OMG it literally removed ALL of my stubborn carpet stains from my 2-legged pets AKA kids lol!!! I am defiantly buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I breed border collies and our household basically runs on this stuff. It literally eats poop remnants out of the carpet. I go over it with my carpet washer later but this is the best quick fix I've found for any type of floor mess and for sterilizing toys and crates too.
customer_reviews.author: EtherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Pet Spray
customer_reviews.text: We have two adorable rescue cats. One of them has an “iffy” stomach and sometimes throws up immediately after eating! This product not only makes the carpet smell better but takes away the stain with very little scrubbing! It’s the BEST 🐾🐶
customer_reviews.author: Grams 🧸

customer_reviews.title: A waste
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed down a couch, according to directions, not only did it not work, (couch smelled exactly the same as before...) but when spraying and wet it smells like a litter box or something, that sharp weird odor.. completely unsatisfied, a waste. Wasted my money , don’t waste yours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have pets but this product is a must have! It smells really good and it works. I use this for everything. I put it in my shampooer to clean the carpet. I use it to refresh fabrics (linen, clothes, sofa, etc) I have to keep this product stocked with my cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Client

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any dog owner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It gets out blood, vomit urine, feces. I recommend it to anyone I know who has a dog. As you know dogs can vomit occasionally. This gets out the yellow gastric emesis stains better than any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Mcyclemom2000

product_meta.title: Woolite Advanced Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Sanitize, 2618, 22oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:22oz (Pack of 2)Now you can sanitize soft surfaces and carpets with Woolite Advanced Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Sanitize. This all-in-one formula cleans, sanitizes, deodorizes, freshens and eliminates allergens on soft surfaces. The unique Penetrating Action goes deep into carpet fibers to thoroughly clean and sanitize-eliminating dirt, stains, odors and bacteria. Great for use in any room of the house, use Woolite Advanced Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Sanitize daily on the soft surfaces your family touches most often for a true clean. Kills 99. 9% of Enterobacter aerogenes (ATCC 13408) and Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 6538) (Staph) on carpets (not for use on Polypropylenes/olefin or wool fibers) and soft surfaces.
feature_bullets: Kills 99. 9% of bacteria on soft surfaces (Kills 99. 9% of Enterobacter aerogenes (ATCC 13408) and Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 6538))
Penetrates to eliminate pet odors at their source.
Cleans, sanitizes, and deodorizes in one easy step.
Leaves carpets sanitized for children and pets when used as directed.

One sprayer is included with two-packs. Please keep your sprayer and reuse it for the second bottle (simply remove the sprayer from the first bottle and apply to the second). We do this with the intention to maintain the ability to supply our valued customers during seasons of high demand while helping reduce the use of plastic by reusing those sprayers. Thank you for your support; stay happy and healthy.
